item.title: About
item.description: I am a 30 years old Brazilian web developer who loves software architectures. I have Python as a main programming language. To create systems I use DBMS (PostgresSQL and MySQL) and to organize my projects I like the system used by Python and Django framework in order to separate each module into a folder which contains the MVC architecture. In Django, it is called MVT (Model, View, Template). Currently, I am studying software architectures, REST APIâ€™s and GRAPHQL, for example, together with NodeJS.
